com.intuit.wasabi.experiment

Interface Experiments

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExperimentsImpl

    public interface Experiments
    Interface to perform CRUD operations on experiment. In addition, it also provides validation methods to check the state of experiments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createExperiment

        void createExperiment(NewExperiment newExperiment,
                      UserInfo user)
        Creates a new experiment by adding the specified metadata to the database
        Parameters:
        newExperiment - NewExperiment object
        user - the user creating the experiment

      • getExperiment

        Experiment getExperiment(Experiment.ID id)
        Queries the database and returns metadata for the specified experiment.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique experiment id
        Returns:
        an Experiment object, or null if the experiment is not found or in state "deleted"

      • getExperiment

        Experiment getExperiment(Application.Name appName,
                         Experiment.Label label)
        Queries the repository and returns metadata for the specified experiment and label.
        Parameters:
        appName - Name of application
        label - Experiment.Label
        Returns:
        an Experiment object, or null if the experiment is not found or in state "deleted"

      • getExperiments

        List<Experiment> getExperiments(Application.Name appName)
        ONLY needed if we allow assigning to all experiments in a app Queries the database and returns a list of experiments associated with application appName with metadata.
        Parameters:
        appName - Name of application
        Returns:
        A list of Experiment objects containing experiment metadata. It does not include experiments with state "deleted".

      • getExperiments

        ExperimentList getExperiments()
        Queries the database and returns a list of experiments with metadata.
        Returns:
        a list of Experiment objects containing experiment metadata. It does not include experiments with state "deleted".

      • updateExperiment

        Experiment updateExperiment(Experiment.ID experimentID,
                            Experiment updates,
                            UserInfo user)
        Updates an experiment with specified experiment metadata.
        Parameters:
        experimentID - The unique experiment id
        updates - Experiment object containing experiment metadata to be updated
        user - the user updating the experiment
        Returns:
        Experiment object containing updated experiment metadata

      • checkStateTransition

        void checkStateTransition(Experiment.ID experimentID,
                          Experiment.State currentState,
                          Experiment.State desiredState)
        Check state transition from current to desired state.
        Parameters:
        experimentID - The unique experiment id
        currentState - The current state of an experiment
        desiredState - The desired state of an experiment
        Throws:
        InvalidExperimentStateTransitionException - if the state transition is invalid
        IllegalArgumentException - if 1) No experiment buckets specified. 2) total bucket allocation is not 1.0. 3) More than one bucket is specified as a control bucket

      • checkForIllegalUpdate

        void checkForIllegalUpdate(Experiment experiment,
                           Experiment updates)
        Check for illegal update of an experiment.
        Parameters:
        experiment - Current Experiment
        updates - Experiment metadata that will be checked against
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Experiment ID, ModificationTime or CreationTime is being updated

      • checkForIllegalTerminatedUpdate

        void checkForIllegalTerminatedUpdate(Experiment experiment,
                                     Experiment updates)
        Check for illegal update when current experiment is in TERMINATED state.
        Parameters:
        experiment - Current Experiment
        updates - Experiment metadata that will be checked against
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the currentState is "TERMINATED" and if any attribute other than description is being updated

      • checkForIllegalPausedRunningUpdate

        void checkForIllegalPausedRunningUpdate(Experiment experiment,
                                        Experiment updates)
        Check for illegal update when current experiment is RUNNING/PAUSED state.
        Parameters:
        experiment - Current Experiment
        updates - Experiment metadata that will be checked against
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the experiment is in RUNNING/PAUSED state and if applicationName or Label is being updated. Also, if startTime/endTime is being updated with a value that has already passed or when the established startTime/endTime has already passed.

      • buildUpdatedExperiment

        boolean buildUpdatedExperiment(Experiment experiment,
                               Experiment updates,
                               Experiment.Builder builder,
                               List<Experiment.ExperimentAuditInfo> changeList)
        Build updated experiment with the specified Experiment updates.
        Parameters:
        experiment - Current Experiment
        updates - Experiment metadata that will be checked against
        builder - Experiment.Builder
        changeList - List of Experiment.ExperimentAuditInfo
        Returns:
        true if update is required. changeList will be updated upon return.

      • updateSegmentationRule

        void updateSegmentationRule(Experiment experiment,
                            UserInfo user)
        Update segmentation rule with the specified experiment metadata.
        Parameters:
        experiment - Experiment object
        user - the user updating the segmentation rule.

      • getApplications

        List<Application.Name> getApplications()
        Queries the database and returns a list of application names
        Returns:
        a list of Application.Name types
